Description: This document describes all available configuration options for data generation templates

ArrayLengths._description: Defines sizes for arrays in the output. Can use fixed numbers or random ranges.
ArrayLengths._note: Supports up to 4 levels of array nesting

StaticFields._description: Fields with fixed static values that don't change between records
StaticFields._note: Can reference both top-level and nested array fields

SequenceFields._note: Generates values like PREFIX_001, PREFIX_002, etc. Can use dynamic variables with double curly braces such as {{dt}}, {{dttm}} in prefixes

RandomFields._description: Array of field specifications with random value generation

Available_FieldTypes.description: Random integer between min and max (inclusive)
Random float between min and max
Random alphanumeric string of specified length
ISO format date/time. Supports: datetime(now), datetime(past), datetime(future), datetime(7) for 7 days from now, or datetime(-3) for 3 days ago
YYYY-MM-DD format date. Supports: date(now), date(past), date(future), date(7) for 7 days from now, or date(-3) for 3 days ago
Non-repeating random selection from provided options. Once all choices are used, it resets and starts reusing values randomly.
Available_FieldTypes.note: Tracks used values per field path to ensure uniqueness across all generated records

Available_FieldTypes.description: Sequential selection from provided options in order from first to last. Once all choices are used, it resets and starts over from the first option.
Available_FieldTypes.note: Tracks position per field path to ensure sequential ordering across all generated records

QueryContextFields._description: Fields populated from database queries with optional transformations

Required_Properties.query: String - Name of the predefined query to execute
Required_Properties.column: String - Column name from query results to use

mode.description: How to select values from the query results
options: random (default) - Select random row from results
unique - Select from unique values only
sequential - Select based on deterministic sequence
match - Match rows based on template_key/query_key

Optional_Properties.template_key: String - Field in template to match against (for match mode)
Optional_Properties.query_key: String - Column in query to match against (for match mode)

operation.description: Mathematical transformation to apply to the value

LinkedFields._description: Fields whose values are derived from other fields in the record
LinkedFields._note: Source and target fields can be at any nesting level
